examples: The oil spill was an environmental catastrophe.
He grew up in a loving environment.
Pollution is bad for the environment.
Environmental Protection Agency
The company said that it had always acted in compliance with environmental laws.

She belongs to an environmental group.
We support the union of the environmental pressure groups into a federation.
His book tells of an environmental apocalypse.
an international meeting to discuss environmental issues
Funny how religion is creeping into the environmental debate.
Many plants are unable to survive in such a harsh environment.
Environmental quality will be the watchword for the 21st century.
Environmental Studies
Peter is passionately involved in environmental issues.
With electric cars there is a big environmental payoff.
The government seems confident that environmental problems can be fixed.
The company described reports of environmental disaster as gross exaggeration.
the species that fill an environmental niche
Heredity and environment are both important.
Environmental issues came to the fore in the 1980s.
We're trying to create a better business environment.
the government's myopic attitude to environmental issues

Environmental experts said the move would set back further research.
The agency conducted an environmental study.
the environmental impact of pollution from cars

These animals were raised in a controlled environment.
the environmental damage caused by the chemical industry
example_translate: Этот разлив нефти оказался экологической катастрофой.
Он вырос в любви и заботе.

Управление по изучению окружающей среды (в США)
Она входит в группу по защите окружающей среды.
Мы поддерживаем объединение экологических групп давления в федерацию.

международное совещание для обсуждения экологических проблем

Многие растения не в состоянии выжить в таких суровых условиях.

виды, заполняющие экологическую нишу
